overview: Shiva is an innocent man, who lives in a small village in a forest. After disputes with the authorities, the villagers are forced to evacuate. Then he moves to the city in search of his livelihood, and falls in love with a girl named Nandini, but he is forced to take an illegal path to earn a living his day, becoming the most wanted man by the police, can the police arrest him? Will Nandini marry? This is what you will see in the movie
title: Rugged
